group_1.textCenter: (I spent half of today observing you and chatting@with you...)
(And the mystery of Puella Care is deeper than@ever.)
(Yozuru-san, you're always concerned about those around you.)
(Perhaps I wasted some of my time here...)
(But I'll be making my report with conviction:)
(That Yozuru is a very gentle soul.)

group_1.textRight: We're back.

group_1.textLeft: *Mumble!*
Welcome home.

group_1.textRight: So, how'd it go with that girl?
Got her t'stop frettin' over us?

group_1.textLeft: Well... To be honest, I'm not really certain.
Some Promised Blood members came in the middle@of our chat...

group_1.textRight: Whoa, rotten luck!
Though your face says you had fun anyway.

group_1.textLeft: Indeed... We had a wonderful chat.

group_1.textRight: "All's well", then!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, but when things were getting tense...
...I tried making faces to calm things down.@I totally blew it.
My book recommended jokes to help calm things@down, but...

group_1.textRight: Gotta be a question of quality.
Train more and you'll nail it for sure.

group_1.textLeft: Train, you say?

group_1.textRight: "Yozuru Training", see?
*Mumble muffle!!*

group_1.textLeft: I see...
But teacher, today was just too much.

group_1.textRight: Oh, whinin' now?

group_1.textLeft: "Whining", you say?
Anyways.@Yozuru, we leave her in your capable hands.

group_1.textRight: ...Huh?

group_1.textLeft: Seems to me this girl's REALLY frettin' over us.

group_1.textRight: I see...

group_1.textLeft: So Yozuru, why donâ€™tcha set her mind at ease?

group_1.textRight: W-why me?

group_1.textLeft: This task clearly isn't my forte.
That's why I said it's too much.
You know very well that I lack [textRed:gentleness].
Without a gentle heart...
...It's very hard for me to dispel other's suspicion.

group_1.textRight: That's the whole point. Call it part of the training.
You got the hang of that book yet?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I believe I did everything I could.
I may have blown it, but I managed some updates@too.

group_1.textRight: Well good on ya, then.
A Coordinator who can't figure out her client's@state of mind's no Coordinator at all.
An' gentleness -- havin' it an' understandin'@it -- is part of the package.
I know it's hard on you, missin' the gentleness bit...
But if you're gonna be a Coordinator, that book's@gonna have to be your guide.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, which I appreciate very much.
This guidebook to gentleness, which you so kindly recommended...
Shall be my guiding light...
And let me disguise myself as a gentle human being.

group_1.textRight: *Mmf!* *Hmmph mnf!*

group_1.textLeft: That's the your stomach's emptiness alarm!
And faced with an empty-stomached person, a@gentle human being must...
...Here we are...
...Offer them food!
So, let me prepare us a meal...
But it's almost evening!
With dinner approaching, it must be time for...
...Here it is!...
...A light helping of sweets!
So, please let me fix you a few sweets, okay?
And for my teacher too.

group_1.textRight: Good thinkin'.
Even if you're not hungry, you'd want what you@see your neighbor eating.
Nice job on the psychology front.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, that's one of the patterns in the book.

group_1.narration: Why am I lacking in gentleness?
The story begins back when I was still a gentle person.

group_1.textRight: Wow, Yozuru! Well done!

group_1.textLeft: Yay!

group_1.textRight: I'm so looking forward to your future.

group_1.narration: A story from when I was young.@And gentle.@...And not free.

group_1.textCenter: There are too many things in the way for@me to go on living...
